summary: This document is a series of email exchanges from June 11, 2008, scheduling a telephone meeting for Friday, June 13, 2008, at 10:00 AM to discuss 'Epstein'. The meeting was to be held from 'E's ofc' (likely Epstein's office) and involved participants from USAFLS and ODAG (SMO).

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The entire email chain is about scheduling a meeting to discuss 'Epstein'. The meeting location is noted as 'E's ofc', likely referring to his office.

events.title: Scheduled Epstein Discussion Meeting
events.description: A telephone meeting was scheduled for 10:00 AM to 10:30 AM Eastern Time to discuss 'Epstein'. The meeting was to originate from 'E's ofc' (Epstein's office).

keyFacts: A meeting to discuss Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled via email on June 11, 2008, for June 13, 2008.
The meeting was a teleconference scheduled from 10:00 AM to 10:30 AM Eastern Time.
The point of origin for the call was noted as 'E's ofc', strongly implying Jeffrey Epstein's office.
Participants included individuals from 'USAFLS' and 'ODAG (SMO)', which are likely U.S. government or legal office identifiers.
The document shows official coordination and scheduling concerning Epstein in mid-2008.
